query.sql: SELECT c.column_name, c.description FROM applsys.fnd_tables t, applsys.fnd_columns c WHERE c.table_id = t.table_id AND t.table_name =:OBJECT_NAME ORDER BY C.column_sequence

SELECT table_name "TABLE", foreign_table, foreign_key_columns FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT '1' sorter, foreign_key_name, t2.table_name, 'SQLDEV:LINK:'|| at.owner|| ':TABLE:'|| at.table_name|| ':oracle.dbtools.raptor.controls.grid.DefaultDrillLink' foreign_table, c.column_name foreign_key_columns FROM fnd_foreign_keys fk, fnd_tables tp, fnd_tables t2, applsys.fnd_foreign_key_columns fkc, applsys.fnd_columns c, all_tables at WHERE fk.primary_key_table_id = tp.table_id AND fkc.foreign_key_id = fk.foreign_key_id AND fkc.column_id = c.column_id AND fk.table_id = t2.table_id AND at.table_name = tp.table_name AND t2.table_name =:OBJECT_NAME UNION SELECT DISTINCT '2' sorter, foreign_key_name, 'SQLDEV:LINK:'|| at.owner|| ':TABLE:'|| at.table_name|| ':oracle.dbtools.raptor.controls.grid.DefaultDrillLink' table_name, t2.table_name foreign_table, c.column_name foreign_key_columns FROM fnd_foreign_keys fk, fnd_tables tp, fnd_tables t2, applsys.fnd_foreign_key_columns fkc, applsys.fnd_columns c, all_tables at WHERE fk.primary_key_table_id = t2.table_id AND fkc.foreign_key_id = fk.foreign_key_id AND fkc.column_id = c.column_id AND fk.table_id = tp.table_id AND at.table_name = tp.table_name AND t2.table_name =:OBJECT_NAME ORDER BY 1,2)
